content.title: Kennesaw State University in Georgia
content.description: As one of Georgia's most innovative institutions in teaching and learning, Kennesaw State University offers undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees across two metro Atlanta campuses. Kennesaw State is a member of the University System of Georgia and the third-largest university in Georgia.

Find Your Degree

KSU offers 190+ bachelor's, master's, doctoral degrees and programs. Search below to find your degree or view Certificates and Minor programs.


Search by Degree Type

  • Undergraduate
  • Graduate
  • Online

It’s Time to File Your FAFSA

Your Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA®) form applies to a single academic year. That means you need to submit a FAFSA form each year to maximize the amount and types of aid you could receive. If you know you’re going to need financial aid to afford college – or if you think there’s a chance you will need it – you should file a FAFSA. Button Copy: Start Your FAFSA Today!  

Start Your FAFSA Today!

Why Choose KSU?

  • Awesome Location

    Only 15 miles from the excitement of Atlanta, with even more excitement locally.

  • Over 190 Programs

    A leader in innovative teaching and learning, KSU offers over 190 undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees and programs.

  • R2 University

    Kennesaw State is a Carnegie-designated doctoral research institution (R2), placing it among an elite group of only 7 percent of U.S. colleges.

Join KSU on ZeeMee

KSU is part of the ZeeMee community. Join today to meet with other students, participate in live social events, and more!

How much does it cost?

KSU is dedicated to ensuring that you know what to expect financially, and helping you identify potential sources of financial aid.

COST FOR BACHELOR'S
COST FOR MASTER'S & DOCTORATE

# Discover your passion and purpose at KSU

## Find Your Degree
KSU offers 190+ bachelor's, master's, doctoral degrees and programs. Search below to find your degree or view [Certificates](https://www.kennesaw.edu/degrees-programs/certificates/index.php) and [Minor](https://www.kennesaw.edu/degrees-programs/minors/index.php) programs.
![magnifying glass](https://www.kennesaw.edu/webstatic/_resources/images/template/search.svg)
Search by Degree Type

  * [Graduate](https://programfinder.kennesaw.edu/s/search.html?collection=kennesaw-program-finder-meta&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Master&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Doctorate&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Specialist)

![It’s Time to File Your FAFSA](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/grayspace/2025-osfa-fafsa.jpg)
It’s Time to File Your FAFSA 
Your Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA®) form applies to a single academic year. That means you need to submit a FAFSA form each year to maximize the amount and types of aid you could receive. If you know you’re going to need financial aid to afford college – or if you think there’s a chance you will need it – you should file a FAFSA. Button Copy: Start Your FAFSA Today! 
[Start Your FAFSA Today! ](https://www.kennesaw.edu/financial-aid/student-resources/how-to-apply.php)
## Why Choose KSU?
  * ![georgia](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/georgia-gold.svg)Awesome Location Only 15 miles from the excitement of Atlanta, with even more excitement locally.
  * ![graduation cap](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/graduation-cap-gold.svg)Over 190 Programs A leader in innovative teaching and learning, KSU offers over 190 undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees and programs.
  * ![award ribbon](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/award-gold.svg)R2 University Kennesaw State is a Carnegie-designated doctoral research institution (R2), placing it among an elite group of only 7 percent of U.S. colleges.


How much does it cost?
KSU is dedicated to ensuring that you know what to expect financially, and helping you identify potential sources of financial aid.

metadata.title: Kennesaw State University in Georgia
metadata.description: As one of Georgia's most innovative institutions in teaching and learning, Kennesaw State University offers undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees across two metro Atlanta campuses. Kennesaw State is a member of the University System of Georgia and the third-largest university in Georgia.

It’s Time to File Your FAFSA

Your Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA®) form applies to a single academic year. That means you need to submit a FAFSA form each year to maximize the amount and types of aid you could receive. If you know you’re going to need financial aid to afford college – or if you think there’s a chance you will need it – you should file a FAFSA. Button Copy: Start Your FAFSA Today!  

Start Your FAFSA Today!

Why Choose KSU?

  • Awesome Location

    Only 15 miles from the excitement of Atlanta, with even more excitement locally.

  • Over 190 Programs

    A leader in innovative teaching and learning, KSU offers over 190 undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees and programs.

  • R2 University

    Kennesaw State is a Carnegie-designated doctoral research institution (R2), placing it among an elite group of only 7 percent of U.S. colleges.

Join KSU on ZeeMee

KSU is part of the ZeeMee community. Join today to meet with other students, participate in live social events, and more!

How much does it cost?

KSU is dedicated to ensuring that you know what to expect financially, and helping you identify potential sources of financial aid.

COST FOR BACHELOR'S
COST FOR MASTER'S & DOCTORATE

# Discover your passion and purpose at KSU
  * [ ![Graduation cap](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/graduation_cap.svg)Find Your Degree](https://www.kennesaw.edu/#degree_finder)
  * [ ![Magnifying Glass Price](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/see_cost.svg)See the Cost](https://www.kennesaw.edu/#cost)
  * [ ![Writing Application Information](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/apply_pen.svg)Apply to KSU](https://www.kennesaw.edu/#apply)


## Find Your Degree
KSU offers 190+ bachelor's, master's, doctoral degrees and programs. Search below to find your degree or view [Certificates](https://www.kennesaw.edu/degrees-programs/certificates/index.php) and [Minor](https://www.kennesaw.edu/degrees-programs/minors/index.php) programs.
![magnifying glass](https://www.kennesaw.edu/webstatic/_resources/images/template/search.svg)
Search by Degree Type
  * [Undergraduate](https://programfinder.kennesaw.edu/s/search.html?collection=kennesaw-program-finder-meta&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Bachelor)
  * [Graduate](https://programfinder.kennesaw.edu/s/search.html?collection=kennesaw-program-finder-meta&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Master&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Doctorate&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Specialist)
  * [Online](https://programfinder.kennesaw.edu/s/search.html?f.Format%7CprogramFormat=Online&collection=kennesaw-program-finder-meta)


![It’s Time to File Your FAFSA](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/grayspace/2025-osfa-fafsa.jpg)
It’s Time to File Your FAFSA 
Your Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA®) form applies to a single academic year. That means you need to submit a FAFSA form each year to maximize the amount and types of aid you could receive. If you know you’re going to need financial aid to afford college – or if you think there’s a chance you will need it – you should file a FAFSA. Button Copy: Start Your FAFSA Today! 
[Start Your FAFSA Today! ](https://www.kennesaw.edu/financial-aid/student-resources/how-to-apply.php)
## Why Choose KSU?
  * ![georgia](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/georgia-gold.svg)Awesome Location Only 15 miles from the excitement of Atlanta, with even more excitement locally.
  * ![graduation cap](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/graduation-cap-gold.svg)Over 190 Programs A leader in innovative teaching and learning, KSU offers over 190 undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees and programs.
  * ![award ribbon](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/award-gold.svg)R2 University Kennesaw State is a Carnegie-designated doctoral research institution (R2), placing it among an elite group of only 7 percent of U.S. colleges.


How much does it cost?
KSU is dedicated to ensuring that you know what to expect financially, and helping you identify potential sources of financial aid.
[COST FOR BACHELOR'S](https://financialaid.kennesaw.edu/student-resources/cost-of-attendance.php)
[COST FOR MASTER'S & DOCTORATE](https://www.kennesaw.edu/admissions/graduate/financial-information.php)
How do I apply?
  * [ ![KSU student with backpack](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/general/bachelors-alt.jpg)Apply for Bachelor's](https://www.kennesaw.edu/apply.php#underapp)
  * [ ![Graduate student in cap and gown](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/general/masters-alt.jpg)Apply for Master's & Doctorate](https://www.kennesaw.edu/apply.php#gradapp)

# Discover your passion and purpose at KSU
  * [ ![Graduation cap](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/graduation_cap.svg)Find Your Degree](https://www.kennesaw.edu/#degree_finder)
  * [ ![Magnifying Glass Price](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/see_cost.svg)See the Cost](https://www.kennesaw.edu/#cost)
  * [ ![Writing Application Information](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/apply_pen.svg)Apply to KSU](https://www.kennesaw.edu/#apply)


## Find Your Degree
KSU offers 190+ bachelor's, master's, doctoral degrees and programs. Search below to find your degree or view [Certificates](https://www.kennesaw.edu/degrees-programs/certificates/index.php) and [Minor](https://www.kennesaw.edu/degrees-programs/minors/index.php) programs.
![magnifying glass](https://www.kennesaw.edu/webstatic/_resources/images/template/search.svg)
Search by Degree Type
  * [Undergraduate](https://programfinder.kennesaw.edu/s/search.html?collection=kennesaw-program-finder-meta&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Bachelor)
  * [Graduate](https://programfinder.kennesaw.edu/s/search.html?collection=kennesaw-program-finder-meta&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Master&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Doctorate&f.Program+Type%7CprogramType=Specialist)
  * [Online](https://programfinder.kennesaw.edu/s/search.html?f.Format%7CprogramFormat=Online&collection=kennesaw-program-finder-meta)


![It’s Time to File Your FAFSA](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/grayspace/2025-osfa-fafsa.jpg)
It’s Time to File Your FAFSA 
Your Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA®) form applies to a single academic year. That means you need to submit a FAFSA form each year to maximize the amount and types of aid you could receive. If you know you’re going to need financial aid to afford college – or if you think there’s a chance you will need it – you should file a FAFSA. Button Copy: Start Your FAFSA Today! 
[Start Your FAFSA Today! ](https://www.kennesaw.edu/financial-aid/student-resources/how-to-apply.php)
## Why Choose KSU?
  * ![georgia](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/georgia-gold.svg)Awesome Location Only 15 miles from the excitement of Atlanta, with even more excitement locally.
  * ![graduation cap](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/graduation-cap-gold.svg)Over 190 Programs A leader in innovative teaching and learning, KSU offers over 190 undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees and programs.
  * ![award ribbon](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/icons/award-gold.svg)R2 University Kennesaw State is a Carnegie-designated doctoral research institution (R2), placing it among an elite group of only 7 percent of U.S. colleges.


How much does it cost?
KSU is dedicated to ensuring that you know what to expect financially, and helping you identify potential sources of financial aid.
[COST FOR BACHELOR'S](https://financialaid.kennesaw.edu/student-resources/cost-of-attendance.php)
[COST FOR MASTER'S & DOCTORATE](https://www.kennesaw.edu/admissions/graduate/financial-information.php)
How do I apply?

  * [ ![Graduate student in cap and gown](https://www.kennesaw.edu/images/general/masters-alt.jpg)Apply for Master's & Doctorate](https://www.kennesaw.edu/apply.php#gradapp)

metadata.title: Kennesaw State University in Georgia
metadata.description: As one of Georgia's most innovative institutions in teaching and learning, Kennesaw State University offers undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees across two metro Atlanta campuses. Kennesaw State is a member of the University System of Georgia and the third-largest university in Georgia.
